column4: Can anybody help me installing Zsnes 1.51 from Terminal? Thanks
Find the it's website, download, and read the "INSTALL" or "README" file
Before you try to do any compiling though, run this "sudo apt-get install build-essential"
You using the SVN version or something?
Usually with actual releases don't need to run autogen.sh
You need to install the sdl dev package
The general rule with compiling is when it says it needs a package (and the app is c/c++) it means you need the -dev package, which 90% of the time can be found in the repos
I tend to add "| grep <name>" to the end too...
I have installed the package and the error comes again... ?
What is this that you are compiling again?
